Validate mapping: Sphere has two KeyDetector MonoBehaviours matching the provided script (guid 4f1f41ed7c4cfc94d930897342a16527). MonoBehaviour id 33018426 has displayTag=Display, keypadTag=Keypad, keypadButtonTag=KeypadButton; MonoBehaviour id 33018431 has displayTag=Display2, keypadTag=Keypad2, keypadButtonTag=KeypadButton2. SphereCollider(id 33018427) isTrigger=0; Rigidbody present. This step: enter ButtonBack (fileID 951466313, BoxCollider isTrigger=1, KeyFeedback MonoBehaviour id 951466316) while display is empty to cover Back when no characters (no removal, sets KeyFeedback.keyHit=true).

Press Button(1) (fileID 195114625, tag KeypadButton2, BoxCollider isTrigger=1, KeyFeedback id 195114628). Expected: KeyDetector(33018431) OnTriggerEnter appends '1' to Display2 (max 4 chars), sets KeyFeedback.keyHit=true to play sound/flash.
Press Button(2) (fileID 1362274088, KeyFeedback id 1362274091). Expected: append '2' (now '12'), KeyFeedback.keyHit=true.
Press Button(3) (fileID 294570348, KeyFeedback id 294570351). Expected: append '3' (now '123'), KeyFeedback.keyHit=true.
Press Button(4) (fileID 691591083, KeyFeedback id 691591086). Expected: append '4' (now '1234' at max length), KeyFeedback.keyHit=true.
Overflow guard: press Button(5) (fileID 851985417, KeyFeedback id 851985420). Expected: no change to display because max 4 chars reached; KeyFeedback.keyHit=true still toggles feedback.
Press ButtonBack (fileID 951466313, KeyFeedback id 951466316). Expected: remove last character ('1234' -> '123'), KeyFeedback.keyHit=true.
Press Button(6) (fileID 2087223067, KeyFeedback id 2087223070). Expected: append '6' ('123' -> '1236'), at max length again; KeyFeedback.keyHit=true.
Attempt another overflow: press Button(7) (fileID 2122760608, KeyFeedback id 2122760611). Expected: still 4-char cap (no append), feedback plays via KeyFeedback.keyHit=true.

Press ButtoConfirm (fileID 1619357597, KeyFeedback id 1619357600). Expected: since display length > 0, KeyDetector(33018431) calls KeyPadControll.CheckIfCorrect(int). Display2 text becomes 'Correct' or 'Retry'; KeyFeedback feedback occurs.

Non-numeric reset path: press Button(8) (fileID 1249007308, KeyFeedback id 1249007311). If prior Confirm showed non-numeric text (e.g., 'Retry'), KeyDetector clears display then appends '8'. KeyFeedback.keyHit=true.
Press Button(9) (fileID 571652021, KeyFeedback id 571652024). Expected: append '9' (now '89' if cleared), KeyFeedback.keyHit=true.
Press Button(0) (fileID 354067704, KeyFeedback id 354067707). Expected: append '0' (e.g., '890'), KeyFeedback.keyHit=true.

Press ButtoConfirm again (fileID 1619357597). Expected: CheckIfCorrect invoked with current numeric display; Display2 updates to 'Correct' or 'Retry'; KeyFeedback feedback occurs. This concludes coverage for: number append, max length cap, backspace removal, non-numeric reset, and confirm validation.

Validation setup: Sphere has two KeyDetector MonoBehaviours that match the provided script (guid 4f1f41ed7c4cfc94d930897342a16527). MonoBehaviour id 28697939 is configured for Display2/Keypad2/KeypadButton2; MonoBehaviour id 28697942 is configured for Display/Keypad/KeypadButton. SphereCollider(id 28697943) isTrigger=0; Rigidbody present. The following triggers target KeypadButton2-tagged buttons to cover KeyDetector(28697939). Expect only Display2 to update; Display remains unaffected.
Enter ButtonBack (fileID 951466313, tag KeypadButton2). If Display2 is empty, expect no removal; KeyFeedback.keyHit set true for feedback.
Press Button(1) (fileID 195114625). Expect Display2 += '1' (len=1); KeyFeedback.keyHit=true on the button.
Press Button(2) (fileID 1362274088). Expect Display2: '12'; KeyFeedback.keyHit=true.
Press Button(3) (fileID 294570348). Expect Display2: '123'; KeyFeedback.keyHit=true.
Press Button(4) (fileID 691591083). Expect Display2: '1234' (max length reached at 4); KeyFeedback.keyHit=true.
Overflow guard: press Button(5) (fileID 851985417). Expect no change to Display2 (still '1234'); KeyFeedback.keyHit=true toggles feedback only.
Backspace: press ButtonBack (fileID 951466313). Expect Display2 becomes '123'; KeyFeedback.keyHit=true on ButtonBack.
Append after backspace: press Button(6) (fileID 2087223067). Expect Display2: '1236' (back to max length); KeyFeedback.keyHit=true.
Attempt another overflow: press Button(7) (fileID 2122760608). Expect Display2 unchanged (still 4 chars); KeyFeedback.keyHit=true.
Confirm path: press ButtoConfirm (fileID 1619357597). With Display2 length > 0, expect KeyDetector(28697939) to call KeyPadControll.CheckIfCorrect(int). Display2 changes to 'Correct' or 'Retry'.

Non-numeric reset: press Button(8) (fileID 1249007308). If previous Confirm set non-numeric text (e.g., 'Retry'/'Correct'), expect KeyDetector to clear Display2 then append '8'. KeyFeedback.keyHit=true.
Press Button(9) (fileID 571652021). Expect Display2 append '9' (e.g., becomes '89'); KeyFeedback.keyHit=true.
Press Button(0) (fileID 354067704). Expect Display2 append '0' (e.g., '890'); KeyFeedback.keyHit=true.
